Tasked with leading a team of newcomers due to Kerry Packer's World Series Cricket, Simpson not only captained with tactical brilliance but also topped the run charts, playing a crucial role in Australia's 3-2 series victory.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/obituary-even-when-past-his-prime-bobby-simpson-always-got-the-better-of-india/articleshow/123342077.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/obituary-even-when-past-his-prime-bobby-simpson-always-got-the-better-of-india/articleshow/123342077.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 09:43:59 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>AVIJIT GHOSH</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1418007" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123342096,imgsize-1418007.cms"/></item><item><title>Irfan Pathan exposes Pakistan’s hypocrisy</title><description><![CDATA[Irfan Pathan has criticized Pakistan for presuming to be the protectors of Muslims globally, urging them to address their own issues first. He also spoke about his rivalry with Shahid Afridi, recalling personal insults and on-field battles.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/cricket-saare-jo-musalman-hai-duniya-ke-irfan-pathan-exposes-pakistans-hypocrisy/articleshow/123341696.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/cricket-saare-jo-musalman-hai-duniya-ke-irfan-pathan-exposes-pakistans-hypocrisy/articleshow/123341696.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 08:41:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="143058" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123341717,imgsize-143058.cms"/></item><item><title>New Zealand mom and son freed after weeks in US immigration detention</title><description><![CDATA[Sarah Shaw, a New Zealand citizen living in the U.S., and her son were detained for over three weeks due to a travel permit error after a trip to Canada. Despite her work permit renewal, Shaw mistakenly believed her travel authorization was also extended.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/incredibly-isolated-new-zealand-mom-and-son-freed-after-weeks-in-us-immigration-detention-who-is-she/articleshow/123340405.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/incredibly-isolated-new-zealand-mom-and-son-freed-after-weeks-in-us-immigration-detention-who-is-she/articleshow/123340405.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 06:33:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="945290" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123340775,imgsize-945290.cms"/></item><item><title>‘US job’ trap in Hyderabad: Women lured, drugged, raped at ‘office’ parties</title><description><![CDATA[Telangana police uncovered a disturbing racket where young women were lured with promises of US jobs, then drugged, sexually exploited, and financially drained. Posing as an IT company, the accused targeted women with basic qualifications, offering fake training and high salaries. Victims were given date rape drugs at parties, leaving them vulnerable and unaware of the extent of their exploitation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/hyderabad/bizman-held-for-peddling-drugs-accused-of-raping-6-women-at-office-parties/articleshow/123338856.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/hyderabad/bizman-held-for-peddling-drugs-accused-of-raping-6-women-at-office-parties/articleshow/123338856.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 00:36:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>NIRUPA VATYAM</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="61965" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123341089,imgsize-61965.cms"/></item><item><title>Amid heavy rains, IndiGo aircraft suffers tail strike during go-around in Mumbai</title><description><![CDATA[An IndiGo Airbus A321, flight 6E1060 from Bangkok, experienced a tail strike upon landing in Mumbai amidst heavy rainfall. The incident occurred during a low-altitude go-around after an initial aborted landing attempt. IndiGo stated the aircraft will undergo necessary inspections and repairs before resuming operations, prioritizing safety.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/indigo-aircraft-suffers-tail-strike-during-go-around-in-mumbai-in-heavy-rain/articleshow/123335275.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/indigo-aircraft-suffers-tail-strike-during-go-around-in-mumbai-in-heavy-rain/articleshow/123335275.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 07:30:46 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="24778" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123341203,imgsize-24778.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[India-China direct flights resumption likely to boost trade, tourism and economic ties]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/aviation/india-china-flights-resumption-economic-ties-impact-19653647.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[India and China are set to resume direct passenger flights after five years, a move expected to boost trade, tourism, and economic ties. The resumption comes amid growing diplomatic engagement, recent trade approvals, and ahead of Prime Minister Modi’s visit to China for the SCO Summit. Pre-pandemic, over 8 lakh passengers traveled annually between the two countries, with cargo flows also significant. Restoring direct flights is likely to reignite strong demand, supporting business, tourism, and people-to-people exchanges.]]></description>

    </item>

      <description><![CDATA[On average in India, a senior First Officer earns about ₹5 lakh a month. At Emirates or Etihad, it’s ₹10 lakh rupees, tax-free, plus free housing and free schooling for up to 3 children. In the US, the same job can get you ₹17 lakh a month.       <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/economy/india-ibc-reforms-functional-framework-courts-experts-19653521.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Experts say proposed changes to the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code will only work if backed by a functional framework, not left to court-driven resolutions.       <description><![CDATA[Dashverse, an AI-driven entertainment startup, is set to invest 60-70% of its recent $13 million Series A funding into advanced AI research and development. With its microdrama app Dashreels surpassing 5 million downloads in just a month and ranking third on the Google Play Store, the company aims to build India’s leading AI creator ecosystem. CEO Sanidhya Narain highlighted the goal of delivering seamless storytelling through AI, tackling challenges like character consistency. Beyond consumer apps, Dashverse also offers AI-powered tools to help creators produce serialised content, aiming to democratise content creation via a thriving two-sided marketplace.]]></description>
